effect.short: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
effect.full: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

flavorTexts.text:
The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and
Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk,
and Speed stats.

Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk,
and Speed stats.

raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
